title: How Can I Use My AAdvantage Miles to Fly to Jamaica The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: TPG reader Sherry tweeted me to ask about using AAdvantage miles: @thepointsguy – “I have about 100,000 American Airlines miles expiring next year and I’d like to book a trip to Jamaica for my family. When I call AA to book, they are very unhelpful. What should I do?” Sherry, this is a great example of...
